channel.title: Changing the Sprite location ( Where it goes on the client )
channel.description: What file is it to change the sprite location. I have a 317 client. I want to make it go up by the corner ( the logout sprite ) and i know pretty much how to do it, i just need the file that has that in it. Thanks.
